stories.text: I only bothered reading through their extremely vague press release now. It seems their idea of a metaverse is loosely tying together their existing assets plus vr(?) I didn't notice that the current lineup of vr goggles was jumping off the shelves in shops. Do you think this is the next revolution which will transform social media forever? And will a significant part of reality be controlled by a company called meta?
stories.title: Ask HN: What is the use of facebooks metaverse?
Show HN: I have built a Chrome extension for collaborative web browsing
The History of Money in America [video][35:40]

stories.text:
I have a friend who has been offered a position at a tech startup. He will be a software engineer. There are already more than 5 employees (including CEO, etc.), but less than 10.

Besides a salary, he has been offered around .2% of the total shares, vesting over 4 years.

Is that about the right amount? My gut feeling is that it is too low.

I'm wondering what "similarly early" employees have been offered at other startups. Examples would be welcome.
stories.title: Ask HN: How much equity should an early employee get?
Amazon driver survives truck split by train
Mozilla Plays Matchmaker: Microsoft Store Offers Firefox for Windows 10 and 11
